text: Road Rager (2021) was a professional wrestling show made by All Elite Wrestling (AEW). It took place on July 7, 2021 at the James L. Knight Center in Miami, Florida. The event aired as special episode of Dynamite. It was the first Road Rager held by AEW. The main event saw The Young Bucks (Matt and Nick Jackson) defeat Eddie Kingston and Penta El Zero Miedo in a tag team Street Fight. The Bucks put thumbtacks into Kingston's mouth and then Matt hit the Superkick on Kingston to get the pinfall victory. Also on this show, Malakai Black made his AEW debut during the event. He hit the Black Mass on both Cody Rhodes and Arn Anderson after Rhodes' match. Andrade El Idolo also had his first AEW match at the event. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Cody Rhodes (with Arn Anderson) defeated Q. T. title: Road Rager (2021)
